From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | People
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
People
Writers and journalists Artists, musicians, and composers Entertainers, directors, producers, and screenwriters Philosophers, historians, political and social scientists Religious figures Politicians and leaders Military personnel, revolutionaries, and activists Scientists, inventors, and mathematicians Sports figures Miscellaneous

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Quota 2,000 articles.

Total 2,122 articles.

 FA	51
 GA	87
 A	1

 C	684

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | People
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
People
Writers and journalists Artists, musicians, and composers Entertainers, directors, producers, and screenwriters Philosophers, historians, political and social scientists Religious figures Politicians and leaders Military personnel, revolutionaries, and activists Scientists, inventors, and mathematicians Sports figures Miscellaneous

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | People
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
People
Writers and journalists Artists, musicians, and composers Entertainers, directors, producers, and screenwriters Philosophers, historians, political and social scientists Religious figures Politicians and leaders Military personnel, revolutionaries, and activists Scientists, inventors, and mathematicians Sports figures Miscellaneous

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level/5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.


Quota 2,175 articles.

Total 2,304 articles.

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | People
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
People
Writers and journalists Artists, musicians, and composers Entertainers, directors, producers, and screenwriters Philosophers, historians, political and social scientists Religious figures Politicians and leaders Military personnel, revolutionaries, and activists Scientists, inventors, and mathematicians Sports figures Miscellaneous

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Quota 1,360 articles.

Total 1,343 articles.

 FA	13
 GA	51

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | People
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
People
Writers and journalists Artists, musicians, and composers Entertainers, directors, producers, and screenwriters Philosophers, historians, political and social scientists Religious figures Politicians and leaders Military personnel, revolutionaries, and activists Scientists, inventors, and mathematicians Sports figures Miscellaneous

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Quota 500 articles.

Total 494 articles.

Class	#Articles
 FA	10
 GA	33
 A	1
 B	169
 C	179
 FFA	6
 DGA	13
 Start	98
 Stub	4

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | People
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
People
Writers and journalists Artists, musicians, and composers Entertainers, directors, producers, and screenwriters Philosophers, historians, political and social scientists Religious figures Politicians and leaders Military personnel, revolutionaries, and activists Scientists, inventors, and mathematicians Sports figures Miscellaneous

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level/5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Quota 2,400 articles.

Total 2,412 articles.

Class	#Articles
 FA	127
 GA	173
 A	2

 DGA	43

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | People
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
People
Writers and journalists Artists, musicians, and composers Entertainers, directors, producers, and screenwriters Philosophers, historians, political and social scientists Religious figures Politicians and leaders Military personnel, revolutionaries, and activists Scientists, inventors, and mathematicians Sports figures Miscellaneous

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | People
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
People
Writers and journalists Artists, musicians, and composers Entertainers, directors, producers, and screenwriters Philosophers, historians, political and social scientists Religious figures Politicians and leaders Military personnel, revolutionaries, and activists Scientists, inventors, and mathematicians Sports figures Miscellaneous

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Quota 1,275 articles.

Total 1,267 articles.

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | People
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
People
Writers and journalists Artists, musicians, and composers Entertainers, directors, producers, and screenwriters Philosophers, historians, political and social scientists Religious figures Politicians and leaders Military personnel, revolutionaries, and activists Scientists, inventors, and mathematicians Sports figures Miscellaneous

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Quota 1,200 articles.

Total 1,213 articles.

Class	#Articles
 FA	41
 GA	113
 A	1
 B	319

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | People
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
People
Writers and journalists Artists, musicians, and composers Entertainers, directors, producers, and screenwriters Philosophers, historians, political and social scientists Religious figures Politicians and leaders Military personnel, revolutionaries, and activists Scientists, inventors, and mathematicians Sports figures Miscellaneous

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Quota 1,200 articles.

Total 1,173 articles.

< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
History
History

Vital articles are listed as subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. The list serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Quota 3,300 articles.

Total 3,274 articles.

 FA	94
 FL	1
 GA	146

 C	1,332
 LIST	33
 FFA	96
 DGA	81
 FFLC	1

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | Geography
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
Geography
Physical Countries Cities

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the 50,000-article Vital articles/Level 5 list and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Quota 1,900 articles.

Total 1,898 articles.

Class	#Articles
 FA	24
 GA	56
 B	331
 C	567
 LIST	3
 FFA	14
 DGA	24
 Start	770
 Stub	147

< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | Geography
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
Geography
Physical Countries Cities

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Quota 1,400 articles.

Total 1,348 articles.

Class	#Articles
 FA	15
 FL	1
 GA	22
 B	399
 C	422
 LIST	22
 FFA	27
 DGA	44
 Start	438
 Stub	29

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | Geography
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
Geography
Physical Countries Cities

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Quota 2,000 articles.

Total 1,975 articles.

 FA	14

 DGA	56
 Start	647

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
Arts
Arts

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Quota 3,300 articles.

Total 3,322 articles.

Class	#Articles
 FA	103
 GA	200
 B	788
 C	1,344
 LIST	4
 FFA	63
 DGA	87
 Start	850
 Stub	33

Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
Philosophy and religion
Philosophy and religion

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Quota 1,400 articles.

Total 1,418 articles.

Class	#Articles
 FA	14
 FL	1
 GA	67
 B	445
 C	606
 LIST	3
 FFA	21
 DGA	38
 FFLC	1
 Start	274
 Stub	8

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
Everyday life
Everyday life Sports, games and recreation

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Quota 1,200 articles.

Total 1,196 articles.

Class	#Articles
 FA	4
 GA	25
 B	206
 C	417
 LIST	6
 FFA	8
 DGA	23
 Start	501
 Stub	37

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | Everyday life
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
Everyday life
Everyday life Sports, games and recreation

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Quota 1,200 articles.

Total 1,235 articles.

 FA	39
 GA	72
 B	266
 C	472
 LIST	4
 FFA	33
 DGA	41
 Start	368
 Stub	14

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | Society and social sciences
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
Society and social sciences
Social studies Politics and economics Culture

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Quota 500 articles.

Total 472 articles.

Class	#Articles
 FA	1
 FL	1
 GA	7
 B	124
 C	210
 LIST	1
 FFA	6
 DGA	11
 Start	125
 Stub	3

< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | Society and social sciences
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
Society and social sciences
Social studies Politics and economics Culture

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Quota 1,850 articles.

Total 1,866 articles.

Class	#Articles
 FA	3
 GA	38
 A	1
 B	433
 C	772
 LIST	3
 FFA	44
 DGA	29
 Start	577

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | Society and social sciences
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
Society and social sciences
Social studies Politics and economics Culture

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Quota 1,750 articles.

Total 1,941 articles.

Class	#Articles
 FA	19
 GA	66
 B	528
 C	812
 LIST	6
 FFA	45
 DGA	58
 FFLC	1
 Start	480
 Stub	30

< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | Biology and health sciences
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
Biology and health sciences
Biology Animals Plants Health

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

See also: Agriculture and Biotechnology in Technology
Quota 1,200 articles.

Total 1,045 articles.

 Stub	6

Biology and health sciences
Biology Animals Plants Health

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Quota 2,400 articles.

Total 2,357 articles.

Biology and health sciences
Biology Animals Plants Health

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Plants
This section contains 764 articles. For plant anatomy and morphology, see Anatomy and Morphology - Plant anatomy and morphology. For general plant terms, e.g. Flowering plant, see Botany.

< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | Biology and health sciences
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
Biology and health sciences
Biology Animals Plants Health

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Total 1,140 articles.

Total 991 articles.

Class	#Articles
 FA	14
 FL	1
 GA	79
 B	384

 LIST	1
 FFA	20
 DGA	23
 Start	153
 Stub	3

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | Physical sciences
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
Physical sciences
Basics and measurement Astronomy Chemistry Earth science Physics

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Quota 375 articles.

Total 367 articles.

Class	#Articles
 GA	4
 B	36
 C	132
 LIST	1
 FFA	1
 DGA	3
 Start	146
 Stub	48

Measurement
This section contains 314 articles. This list contains units of measurement and articles on metrology. For the measured quantities, see the Science and Mathematics (Level 4) sections. For timekeeping and navigation, see the Everyday life (Level 4) and Technology (Level 4) sections. For measurement errors, see the Statistics (Level 4) section in Mathematics.

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | Physical sciences
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
Physical sciences
Basics and measurement Astronomy Chemistry Earth science Physics

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

For astronomical instruments, see the Astronomical technology (Level 5) section

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | Physical sciences
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
Physical sciences
Basics and measurement Astronomy Chemistry Earth science Physics

Vital articles are lists of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

For biochemistry, see the Biology section; also see Technology for specific applications of chemistry.

Quota 1,200 articles.

Total 1,181 articles.

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | Physical sciences
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
Physical sciences
Basics and measurement Astronomy Chemistry Earth science Physics

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

For specific geographical objects see Geography

Quota 1,200 articles.

Total 1,204 articles.

Class	#Articles
 FA	7

 LIST	7
 FFA	11
 DGA	15
 Start	476
 Stub	72

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5‎ | Physical sciences
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
Physical sciences
Basics and measurement Astronomy Chemistry Earth science Physics

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

Quota 1,200 articles.

Total 1,170 articles.

Class	#Articles
 FA	8
 GA	14
 B	281
 C	460
 LIST	3
 FFA	5
 DGA	17
 Start	395
 Stub	8
 Unassessed	1

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
Technology
Technology

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
< Wikipedia:Vital articles‎ | Level/5
Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5
Mathematics
Mathematics

Vital articles is a list of subjects for which Wikipedia should have corresponding high-quality articles. It serves as a centralized watchlist to track the status of Wikipedia's most essential articles. This is one of the sub-lists of the fifty thousand article Vital articles/Level 5 and is currently under construction.

Articles in the Vital list have their assessments labelled as:

 Featured articles
 Former featured articles
 A-class articles
 Good articles
 Delisted good articles
 Failed good article nominees
 B-class articles
 C-class articles
 Start-class articles
 Stub-class articles
 List-class articles
 Unassessed articles
The progress bar is auto-updated via category count, and the symbols and article counts are updated daily by User:cewbot. Please read the FAQ before modifying the article list.

See also: People: Mathematicians
Quota 1,200 articles.

Total 1,194 articles.

Class	#Articles
 FA	5
 GA	35

 FFA	12
 DGA	13
 FFLC	1
 Start	278
 Stub	2
